title: Baseline detector UAT fixture (synthetic, deterministic)
scope: Add a compact, deterministic fixture that approximates a minimal 'present' scenario for the baseline ball detector without committing real video.
Use the fixture in a test to ensure the end-to-end runner can produce present ball records with the baseline detector enabled.
acceptance: A fixture spec exists under pipeline/fixtures describing a small synthetic frame sequence.
A test consumes the fixture spec and asserts a minimum number of present ball records are emitted.
Fixture remains small and deterministic (JSON spec only).

deliverables.title: Fixture spec + test consuming it
acceptance: Fixture-driven test passes without external video files.
evidence: Pytest run for the fixture test passes locally.

subtasks.title: Create synthetic fixture spec for deterministic frames.
done_when: Fixture spec checked in and describes frame generation.

subtasks.title: Add test that uses fixture spec and asserts present frames.
done_when: Test reads fixture spec, generates frames, and validates outputs.
